articles.title: Olympics 2021 updates - U.S. A-Team wins beach volleyball gold; USA women reach hoops finals and more from Tokyo - ESPN
articles.description: There are a few days left in these Olympics. America's A-Team brought home gold in beach volleyball, plus the USA women routed Serbia in basketball to reach the gold-medal game yet again.
articles.content:
There are precious few days left at the Olympic Games, and the U.S. women's basketball team is one step closer to another gold medal.

articles.title: Nigerian lawyer wins American Bar Association international human rights award - TheCable
